content.question: On which of the following did Cavour and Garibaldi agree?

choices.label: Once united, Italy should be a republic.
Italy should be independent of foreign control.
Italian unity should be achieved in one way only, by revolution.
The pope should lead any new Italian state.
Foreign assistance was necessary to drive Austria from Italy.

content.answer: Italy should be independent of foreign control.
